name: SRVisit
desc: The user’s progess in their daily travel routine.

items.name: var identifier: UUID
items.desc: A value that maps to a unique geographic location.

items.name: var arrivalDateInterval: DateInterval
items.desc: A range of time within which the user arrives at a location of interest.

items.name: var departureDateInterval: DateInterval
items.desc: A range of time within which the user departs from a location of interest.

items.name: var distanceFromHome: CLLocationDistance
items.desc: The location’s distance from the home-category location.
